title: Tokopedia Store Key Metrics Daily Report
description: Daily report providing key metrics for a store on Tokopedia

Time.description: Date of the report in the format 'MM-DD-YYYY'

Potential_Sales_From_Free_Postage.description: Potential sales amount from free postage

Potential_Sales_from_Free_Postage_Served.description: Potential sales amount from free postage served by Tokopedia

The_potential_sales_are_not_from_free_po.description: Potential sales amount that is not from free postage

New_order_from_free_postage.description: Total number of new orders from free postage

New_orders_from_free_postage_served_by_T.description: Total number of new orders from free postage served by Tokopedia

New_orders_are_not_from_free_postage.description: Total number of new orders that are not from free postage

Cancellation_Automatic_canceled.description: Total number of automatic cancelled orders

Cancellation_Rejected_Seller.description: Total number of cancelled orders rejected by the seller

Cancellation_buyer_request.description: Total number of cancelled orders requested by the buyer

Average_number_of_goods.description: Average number of goods in an order

Operational_expenditure_details_service_.description: Operational expenditure details for service fees

Operational_expenditure_details_Transact.description: Operational expenditure details for transaction service fees

Promotion_expenditure_details_free_posta.description: Promotion expenditure details for free postage

Details_of_Promotion_Expenditures_Free_P.description: Expenditure details for promotions related to free postage served by Tokopedia

Details_of_Promotion_Expenditures_Topads.description: Expenditure details for promotions related to Topads

Details_of_Promotion_Expenditures_Broadc.description: Expenditure details for promotions related to Broadcast Chat

Promotion_expenditure_details_store_coup.description: Expenditure details for promotions related to store coupons
